name: com.hololight.isar
description: Holo-Light ISAR helps to create AR applications that utilize remote rendering on high performance computers and send the rendered scene as a video stream to AR-devices like Microsoft HoloLens.

nosamples.description: Tutorial application demonstrating how to use ISAR. The gesture input is handled only by Unity event system.
Tutorial application demonstrating how to use ISAR in combination with Microsoft's Mixed Reality Toolkit.
